message: I propose a 90/10 split, with me getting the larger share. Let's get this over with quickly!
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my best offer.
I'm still feeling the sting of your last offer.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  It's a fairer deal, and we can avoid further rounds of inflation.
I'm not willing to give up that much more. You're still getting a better deal than I am. I'm willing to compromise, but not that much.
